text: at the height of the Vietnam Mo Dr
Martin Luther King proclaimed that the
bombs in Vietnam explode at home they
destroy the hopes and possibilities of a
decent
America while our society celebrates Dr
King every third Monday of January can
we really say that we have heed his
concerns have we really internalized his
insites have we really actualized this
vision for a greater
democracy a democracy that makes good on
the noble aspirations of our Founders
aspirations that remain open and
unrealized like the blank check Dr King
elw spoke
of I think the answer to these questions
are
clear it is not the king that stood up
against the paride and segregation that
the state celebrates it is not the king
that stood against war and for positive
peace that our state
celebrates the state does not celebrate
the king who realized after segregation
was overthrown
that black and white workers were
finally free to face together as a
people the monster of poverty that the
dominant system subjects humble working
people to and who led on that basis the
multi-racial Poor People's
campaign the king our state celebrates
every January is a domesticated
caricature of the real
one king would today like he was then be
considered the most dangerous man in the
country by the institutions of the deep
[Applause]
State he would likely be with us on this
platform leading the charge cognizant of
the fact that to free Palestine we must
free
ourselves to free Palestine and to free
America are one in the same
struggle the bombs that land in Gaza
land in Detroit
W they are made apparent in The Rusted
ruins of once industrial Powerhouse
cities that were the bases of decent
workingclass communities but which now
occupy many zombified Soul crushed
humans in its City centers humans whose
conception of the future is chained to
the immediate desire for another
hit and F 10 James Madison responds to
the elite of the country those who were
concerned that our formal structures of
political democracy would lead to the
abolition of their property
privileges how can we be sure that if we
give the people the capacity to vote
that they won't overturn A system that
keeps us the owners of all there is at
the top at their
expense Madison's reply was to rort to a
favorite principle of the powerful deid
impa div and conquer factionalized the
propertyless masses as much as possible
whilst they fight amongst themselves
they'll be unable to realize that it is
us who they should be fighting against
much less that it is because of us that
they are fighting each
other the ruling Elite is cognizant of
the necessity to constantly devise ways
to keep us working and humble people
divided for a very long time racism was
the primary form this took today is it
is one amongst
others but what has never stopped being
true is the need that they have to
divide all of us so that they the owners
of big corporations and investment firms
the black rocks the state streets the
vanguards and many others in their Club
sustain themselves in a position of
power parasitically sucking as dry to
enrich
themselves these are the people that
make a killing out of killing
[Applause]
they are the ones who trade in the
annihilation of whole peoples for
profit but today as our people struggle
to make ends
meet as what was Secure in our
grandparents generation becomes insecure
for
us today as Young Americans like some of
us
here represent the first generation in
American history destined to worse
living standard than their
parents today as our people face poverty
debt and Desperation like never before A
Light Of Hope
shines this light is visible in the n910
of the country who look mockingly down
on the mainstream media who they know is
there to lie to dup us into consenting
to the agenda of the ruling Elite like
some folks which are here today
they are there to invent a Topsy Turvy
reality that can manufacture consent our
people know this now more than ever
before the Light Of Hope is also visible
in the 8/10 of our
population who believe that their
elected representatives do not actually
represent them more than ever the
American people are noticing that under
the current system the supposed
representatives of the American people
are in reality the representatives of
the oppressors and exploiters of the
American people they're the
representatives of those who send
hundreds of billions of our tax dollars
to fund genocides and Nazis who send our
brothers and sisters abroad to lose
limbs scar their souls and sometimes
return in caskets alter murder people
whom they have more in common with than
the filthy parasites who sent them there
and who profited from their misfortune
as Memorial Day approaches this is
something we must bear in
mind today the American people are
standing up and saying
no you're a part of it in this
room we are tired of living under the
tyranny of big corporations Banks
investment firms and corrupt
politicians we are done serving your
profits as if it's God losing our
lifeblood for its
accumulation another America is not only
possible but it is a historical
necessity an America that realizes the
dreams and aspirations of Dr Martin
Luther King Jr and of so many of our
heroes and
brightest this America is possible
because we
can through institutions such as the one
launched here today bring our people
together and send chills down the spines
of our
occupiers we can get all the various
forms descent has taken in our
population and give these coherence
systematicity unity and
Direction and when we do this we will
win for ourselves in the end true
sovereignty and an actual form of life
that is of by and for the people thank
you
[Applause]
